org.lobobrowser.gui

Class ContentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lobobrowser.gui.ContentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ContentListener

    public abstract class ContentAdapter
extends Object
implements ContentListener
    A convenience abstract implementation of ContentListener, with blank methods.

    • Method Detail

      • contentSet

        public void contentSet(ContentEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: ContentListener
        Called as soon as the content has been set in a FramePanel. Note that content can be set before the originating document has been fully loaded, for example when incremental rendering is performed.
        Specified by:
        contentSet in interface ContentListener
        Parameters:
        event - The content event.
